```{r setup}
library(cpp)
XY=data_xy(Dep.var ~ . -1, mydataset_noconst)
Y = as.matrix(XY$Y)
X = as.matrix(XY$X)

set.seed(1)
beta0 = rnorm(ncol(X))

tolerance=1e-3  # tolerance

SD_Cpp = betahat_SD_Cpp(beta0, X, Y, tolerance)
SD_Cpp
```
